title: All about music
creator_credit: Fred Calvert, Farmhouse Films and Pyramid Films
brief_description: Provides, through the use of animation, an introduction to the origins and basic elements of music. Tells the story of a caveman and his discovery of rhythm, melody, and harmony. Highlights, with live action inserts, prehistoric contributions to the development of music, including modern music.
